verses.1: “Ahi zongin tu-in, a pate uh kimanna a nei lo ka uite tawh tuu cing dingin a kuan dingin zong ka deih loh, kei sanga a khangno zawte in hong ciamnuih bawl ta uh hi.
verses.2: Amauʼ hatna khempeuh tu-in bei khinta ahih manin, amauʼ hatna kei adingin a kimanna om nawn lo hi.
verses.3: Amaute zawng mahmah in gilkial uh ahih manin gamlak singzung keu peuh teep lel ding uh hi.
verses.4: Amaute in singkungnote botin ne uh a, limna alna a nei lo poding zung nangawn a ne uh hi.
verses.5: Gutate otkhai-in a kidelhkhiat bangin mite lak panin amaute kihawl khia hi.
verses.6: Amaute pen hawkguam sung, leihawm sung, luihawm le keenhawm sungah a ten uh a kul ahi hi.
verses.7: Ganhing bangin gamlak ah amaute ham uh a, sawlkawm nuai ah kilomin a om khawm uh hi.
verses.8: Bangmahin a kimang lo hih bang misia honte, mite omna gam sung panin a kihawl khia hi.
verses.9: Tu-in amaute in kei hong simmawh bawlin hong nuihsan uh a, amauteʼ ciamnuihna bek ka suak khinta hi.
verses.10: Amaute in kei hong kih uh a, kei tawh tehna-in amaute hoih lua kisa uh a, amaute in ka maitang nangawn cil hong phih vial uh hi.
verses.11: Pasian in hong zawngkhalsak, hong cimawhsak ahih manin amaute in a ututun kei hong bawlsia uh hi.
verses.12: Amaute in hong sim gawpin, kei hong tai khiasak uh a, ka sih theih nadingin ka mai ah na pang uh hi.
verses.13: Ka suahtak theih nading lampi na khaktan uh a, kei suksiat ding hanciam uh a, amaute a kho ding kuamah om lo hi.
verses.14: Kei ka bukna leihawm ah amaute hong tuak suk uh a, kei hong sucip suk uh hi.
verses.15: Launa tawh ka kidim a, ka cihtheihna khempeuh meii bangin a theng ta hi.
verses.16: “Tu-in a si ding ka hi ta a, ka gimna panin noptuam ngah nading bangmah om nawn lo hi.
verses.17: Zan thapai-in ka guh sung, ka tang sung khempeuh na a, a hong pet tawntung natna dai ngei peuhmah lo hi.
verses.18: Pasian in ka puan ngawng pan kei hong manin ka puan tawh hong heekcip hi.
verses.19: Buannawng ciim sungah kei hong lawn khia a, ninbulom bang lel ka hi ta hi.
verses.20: “Pasian aw, nang kong sam a, na hong dawng ngei kei hi. Nang tungah thu kong ngen a, nong don het kei hi.
verses.21: Kei tungah nong gilo mahmah a, nong hih theih zahin kei na hong bawlsia hi.
verses.22: Huih lakah na hong lawn a, huih na hong leensak a, huihpi in hong lawn suk hong lawn to hi.
verses.23: Mi khempeuh adingin seh kholhin a kikoih sa sihna ah a hong paipih na hihna ka thei hi.
verses.24: Na hehpih ding a hong thum ding cih loh buang, bangmah dang a hih thei nawn lo misia pa, bang hangin su gawp na hi hiam?
verses.25: A lungkham mite tawh kei kap khawmin, a cimawh mite dahpih hi lo ka hi hiam?
verses.26: Lungdamna le khuavakna ka lamet laitakin, lungkhamna le khua mialna hong tung zawsop hi.
verses.27: Lunggimna le natna in kei hong su gawp a, gimna ka thuak ding cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
verses.28: Lungkham sinkhamin ka om a, mihon lakah dingin huhna ka ngen hi.
verses.29: Kei pen gamkhing sunga a om ngia le vasa-kalaohte tawh kipawlin a kikhawl ka hi ta hi.
verses.30: Ka vun vomin dulh khia a, ka pumtangin ka ci sa gawp hi.
verses.31: Nidangin lungdamna la a kisa ka zakna munah tu-in thumna le kahna aw bek ka za ta hi.
